name: Login with invalid credentials

testSteps.description: Given the user opens the application

testSteps.description: When the user tries to log in with username "wrong_user" and password "wrong_pass"
Then the error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service" should be displayed

userStory.narrative:
As a user
  I want to receive an error message when I log in incorrectly
  So that I can know the credentials are invalid
